law.catch_line: Miami-Dade County Consumer Advocate—Position established; appointment; term; exempt from classified service.

text.section:
Sec. 2-25.1. Miami-Dade County Consumer Advocate—Position established; appointment; term; exempt from classified service.
The position of Miami-Dade County Consumer Advocate is hereby created and established. The Con
sumer Advocate shall be appointed by and serve at the will of the County Manager. The Consumer Advocate shall be a duly licensed practicing attorney of the State of Florida. The Consumer Advocate shall serve under the supervision of the County Manager and shall be exempt from the classified service.
